alert.note: Alert for Renville; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 26 at 3:50AM CST until December 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Renville and Ward Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from Noon today to 6 PM CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow with near whiteout conditions in rural areas. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
